title: How about a nice game of chess?
description:
Make a function that produces an ASCII chessboard using # characters for the black squares and spaces for the white. The input of the function is a number giving the size of each square in characters. For example for an input of 2 the output would be 
"##  ##  ##  ##  \n##  ##  ##  ##  \n  ##  ##  ##  ##\n  ##  ##  ##  ##\n##  ##  ##  ##  \n##  ##  ##  ##  \n  ##  ##  ##  ##\n  ##  ##  ##  ##\n##  ##  ##  ##  \n##  ##  ##  ##  \n  ##  ##  ##  ##\n  ##  ##  ##  ##\n##  ##  ##  ##  \n##  ##  ##  ##  \n  ##  ##  ##  ##\n  ##  ##  ##  ##\n"
(note the trailing newline).

Here's that output again in a more readable way:

##  ##  ##  ##  
##  ##  ##  ##  
  ##  ##  ##  ##
  ##  ##  ##  ##
##  ##  ##  ##  
##  ##  ##  ##  
  ##  ##  ##  ##
  ##  ##  ##  ##
##  ##  ##  ##  
##  ##  ##  ##  
  ##  ##  ##  ##
  ##  ##  ##  ##
##  ##  ##  ##  
##  ##  ##  ##  
  ##  ##  ##  ##
  ##  ##  ##  ##
